page.title: 16FARMING (1)
page.content: {CROPS }The most common crop is{grass. All the farms which completed our questionnaire grow grass.All the farms put together grow 12 different kinds of crops.{ {ANIMALS }The most common animals on the farms are cows,sheep and pigs and there are also a lot of chickens. The farmers take their animals to markets in Exeter,Taunton,Tiverton and Bridgwater. Some take their animals straight to the slaughter house at Willand. {WORKING }The farmers use many different kinds of machinery but even the biggest farm only employs 4 workers. {SELLAKE FARM}On 2 July 1985 we went to this farm which is the biggest in the area.The farmer was called Mr Britton, he was very nice.This farm was built
